readable.title: 3001612175_53567ffb58
readable.content: A man and dog walk down cement steps while a woman in a headscarf looks on from a seated position on the bottom step . A man walks his black dog down the cement steps where a woman dressed in black sits . A woman with a dog descends an outdoor staircase , a bus behind her . A young man walks his dog down some steps where a black-clad woman is sitting One woman is sitting on steps another woman is coming down them .
